review: Very nice!  We love our Fire TV Stick and often have family "discussions" about who gets to control it. The remote travels around the room and sometimes gets displaced. Luckily the phone app works extremely well and allows us to always be in control. This is a great product and has quickly become something our family can't live without.  Well made, incredible quality, very easy to use.

I'm having to go without using the stick for a month.
